name: ContentProtectionKeyRequest
desc: A request for an item’s content protection key.

items.name: assetIdentifier
items.desc: The item’s content key asset identifier.

items.name: context
items.desc: The content the client is playing.

items.name: keyRequest
items.desc: An encrypted key request that contains session, authentication, and integrity information. For FairPlay Streaming, this is the server playback context (SPC); for more information, see FairPlay Streaming Overview.

items.name: keySystem
items.desc: The content’s encryption type, which must match the configuration in  ExtensionConfig.Media.Queues.ContentProtectionKey.Cks.

items.name: userActivity
items.desc: A description of the client’s current playback queue.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the client’s SiriKitMediaAPI library.
